channel.title: Noob question: SSS factotum example patch?
channel.description:
Hi, got my Axoloti a few days back. So far I am really stoked on the unit. I'm controlling it with my Korg nanKEY Studio and having lots of fun with it. So I wanted to try some audio mangling with SSS's factotum object but am struggling with getting some results...
Has anyone an example patch where the object is used and is willing to share???
cheers andRe

item.title: Noob question: SSS factotum example patch?
item.dc:creator: @andRe
item.description:
@andRe wrote:

thanks for your help, got it working, had the wrong combinations ...

maybe you got a solution for the following problems:

-how can i manage to switch through the direction modes via midi, a simple toggle does not work
-do you know how to get rid of the distorted glitches while turning the length and windows knob???

Read full topic
item.source: Noob question: SSS factotum example patch?

item.title: Noob question: SSS factotum example patch?
item.dc:creator: @deef
item.description:
@deef wrote:

the factotum doesn't really need a help-patch.
simply record (toggle to record) audio & play with the parameters.
the problems (no sound e.g.) arises out of a combination of parameters,
it can do sooo much, that sometimes problems seem to appear, like
no pitch-shifting if window = 0
or rate = 1 = normal speed, rate = 0 would be no speed/sound...
one has to learn the factotum like an instrument.

let me know what your problems are if you not solved them yet.

Read full topic
item.source: Noob question: SSS factotum example patch?

item.title: Noob question: SSS factotum example patch?

paging @SirSickSik , best source of info
